title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidery using double-running stitches on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: white linen ground. Red silk embroidery in horizontal lines of zigzag, symmetrical, three-stemmed, conventionalized floral design.
